eu_initiatives:
ISOPA is following closely with main priority the current proposed restriction under REACH by German authorities.  
ISOPA is also following anyother activies under REACH or other chemical regulation with impact on diisocyanates or polyols. 
ISOPA is also interested in all files, activities around circular economy, plastics strategy, ecolabel and ecodesign, energy performance of buildings directive, energy efficiency in general.

goals__remit:
ISOPA is the European trade association for producers of diisocyanates and polyols - the main building blocks of polyurethanes. 
 
* ISOPA promotes the highest standards of best practice in the distribution and use of diisocyanates and polyols 
 
* ISOPA ensures that all stakeholders can easily access accurate and up-to-date information on diisocyanates and polyols 
 
* ISOPA shows how polyurethanes help fulfil society's present and future needs
